titles.title: Behavioral Awareness Training Act of 2018

bill.summary:
Behavioral Awareness Training Act of 2018
This bill creates a new licensing requirement for federal firearms dealers.
Specifically, an applicant for a federal license to deal in firearms must successfully complete an online behavioral awareness training course.
